message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  It's a good deal to get started!
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You get 60% and I get 40%. It's a fair compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60% is still too low.  Let's split it 70/30.  We can both get a decent share.
I'll meet you halfway. 50/50 split. It's a fair and equal share.
